statements: SELECT * FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate, successful_leads FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_leads FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns WHERE total_leads >= 100;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, lead_generation_strategy FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns WHERE lead_generation_strategy IN ('SEO', 'Social Media');
SELECT campaign_name, successful_leads, total_leads FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_leads DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, lead_generation_strategy FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns WHERE lead_generation_strategy LIKE '%Social%' AND conversion_rate > 0.2;
SELECT campaign_id, successful_leads, total_leads FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns ORDER BY successful_leads DESC, total_leads ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate, MAX(total_leads) AS max_total_leads FROM LeadGenerationCampaigns WHERE campaign_end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT strategy_name, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 5;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(spent) AS total_spent FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY impressions DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT AVG(impressions) AS avg_impressions, AVG(clicks) AS avg_clicks FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT strategy_name, clicks, spent FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, AVG(impressions) AS avg_impressions FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_clicks > 100 ORDER BY avg_impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, spent FROM campaign_performance WHERE spent > 1000 AND clicks < 500 ORDER BY impressions ASC, spent DESC;

SELECT A.test_name, A.start_date, B.clicks, B.spent FROM A_B_testing A JOIN campaign_performance B ON A.campaign_id = B.campaign_id WHERE B.impressions > 500 AND A.end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY A.start_date ASC, B.clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT campaign_id, test_strategy FROM ab_test_results ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT test_id, test_results->>'click_through_rate' AS click_rate FROM ab_test_results WHERE test_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_data WHERE campaign_id = 1 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, MAX(conversion_rate) AS max_conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance GROUP BY campaign_id ORDER BY max_conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, test_strategy, test_results->'version' AS test_version FROM ab_test_results WHERE test_results->>'status' = 'success';

SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email, campaign_performance.lead_generation_strategy FROM user_data JOIN campaign_performance ON user_data.campaign_id = campaign_performance.campaign_id WHERE campaign_performance.conversion_rate < 0.3;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance ORDER BY revenue_generated DESC;
SELECT lead_source, lead_quality, lead_conversion_rate FROM lead_generation WHERE lead_quality = 'High';
SELECT group_name, group_size FROM test_group ORDER BY group_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.2;
SELECT campaign_performance.id, campaign_name, strategy_used, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM campaign_performance
SELECT campaign_name, strategy_used, conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY revenue_generated DESC

SELECT campaign_name, lead_source, lead_conversion_rate FROM campaign_performance JOIN lead_generation ON campaign_performance.id = lead_generation.campaign_id WHERE lead_conversion_rate >= 0.10 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC
SELECT campaign_name, group_name, group_size FROM campaign_performance JOIN test_group ON campaign_performance.id = test_group.campaign_id WHERE group_size > 1000 ORDER BY group_size DESC

SELECT group_name, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM test_group JOIN test_results ON test_group.id = test_results.test_group_id WHERE conversion_rate > 0.08 AND revenue_generated > 5000 ORDER BY revenue_generated DESC
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, impressions, clicks FROM ads WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT test_id, test_name, variant, conversion_rate FROM test_results ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, successful_leads ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE successful_leads > 100 AND unsuccessful_leads < 50;
SELECT ad_name, impressions, clicks FROM ads WHERE impressions > 5000 ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= DATE('2022-01-01') AND registration_date <= DATE('2022-12-31');
SELECT test_name, variant, conversion_rate FROM test_results WHERE confidence_level > 0.95;
